title: Disclaimer Page
content:
Effective Date: September 12, 2025
Last Updated: September 12, 2025

Welcome to Doxiverese AI Aggregator Tool (“we,” “our,” or “us”). We value your trust and are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our platform.

We may collect the following types of information:

  • Personal Information: Name, email address, account login details, and billing information when you sign up.
  • Usage Data: Logs of how you interact with our platform, such as queries, aggregated results, pages visited, and device/browser information.
  • AI Query Data: Content you input into Doxiverese for aggregation, analysis, or processing.
  • Cookies & Tracking Data: For session management, preferences, and analytics.

We use the collected data to:

  • Provide, operate, and improve the Doxiverese platform.
  • Deliver AI-powered aggregation results based on your queries.
  • Personalize user experience and optimize system performance.
  • Communicate updates, service changes, or promotional content.
  • Detect and prevent fraudulent or unauthorized activity.

We do not sell your personal data. However, we may share information with:

  • Service Providers: Cloud hosting, analytics, or payment processors.
  • Legal Authorities: When required by applicable law or in response to valid legal requests.
  • Business Transfers: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or company restructuring.
  • Personal information is retained for as long as your account is active.
  • AI query data may be temporarily stored to improve response accuracy and system reliability.
  • You may request deletion of your data at any time (see Your Rights below).

Depending on your jurisdiction, you may have rights to:

  • Access, correct, or delete your personal data.
  • Request a copy of your stored information.
  • Opt out of marketing communications.
  • Restrict or object to data processing.

We implement reasonable technical and organizational measures to protect your data, including:

  • Encrypted connections (HTTPS).
  • Secure cloud storage.
  • Regular security audits and access controls.

However, no system is 100% secure. We cannot guarantee absolute protection.

Doxiverese is not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect data from minors.

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. The latest version will always be posted on this page with the updated “Last Updated” date.
